page.title: 09Farming.
page.content: There is a mixture of farms and small holdings within the block but the majority of them are too small to provide work except for the farmer, his wife and family. In some instances the farmer is also in full time occupation and only runs the farm with the help of his family during his leisure time. Mixed Farming is the main form of Agriculture. Most of the open land near the River Gwendraeth and to the South West of Tumble is used for grazing, the soil is unsuitable for growing crops being to wet and of poor quality. The land has also been extensively worked for coal by means of Opencast Mining. On top of the ridge to the South and South East of Tumble the land is very boggy, marshy and heavy and most of it is unsuitable even for grazing.
